title: Introducing: Dream Harlowe
body:
Very into this Lana Del Rey-esque debut track from LA’s **Dream Harlowe**.

_Moarte_, inspired by meeting her biological father for the first time, drips with the classics influenced elegance of Lana, yet underneaths lies a darker, more sinister edge that truly sets her apart. In truth, this reminds me of NY’s once buzzed about Eddi Front, in it’s storytelling and air of nobility. Check out the video below, alongside the Soundcloud stream.

In truth, this reminds me of NY’s once buzzed about Eddi \[…\]
